benfits.title: Learning Benefits with
benfits.subTitle: Since you're still scrolling, it means the message resonated with you and you're eager to work in this field...
benfits.subTitle2: Let me tell you what you'll gain by learning programming at ITLegend:

benfitsCard.subTitle1: You have a mentor to guide you every step of the way.
benfitsCard.subTitle2: By applying to real-world problems and projects.
benfitsCard.subTitle3: Learn with enjoyment: points, medals, and daily challenges.
benfitsCard.subTitle4: You'll find the learning path that suits you.
benfitsCard.subTitle6: Laptop, mobile, or computer with ease.
benfitsCard.subTitle7: The content is accessible anytime you need it.
benfitsCard.subTitle8: Got a problem? We're here for you.
benfitsCard.subTitle9: Share your achievements and ask your peers.

homeCourse.title: is the accumulation of many right steps Start with the right step...
homeCourse.subTitle: The Free Diploma
homeCourse.title2: I offer a free diploma that teaches you the basics of programming
homeCourse.desc: We offer you a unique opportunity to gain a free diploma that will give you a strong foundation in programming basics. Whether you're a beginner or looking to enhance your skills, this diploma is specially designed to equip you with practical knowledge and the necessary tools to enter the programming world. Join now and take advantage of this special offer that will open new doors in the field of technology and programming!
homeCourse.point2: Will Set a Strong Foundation in Programming
homeCourse.point3: No Prior Knowledge Required, Just Start Immediately

experienceCard.title4: from studying the psychology of programmers
experienceCard.titleHead: Many will teach you programming, but who will prepare you for the job market?
experienceCard.desc: Information is everywhere, but the market demands something else... So the right question is, where is the place that will prepare me to work and earn from what I have learned?
experienceCard.ali_exp: 15 years of experience in the field

about.title: Why choose it?
about.subTitle: Who should take this path?
about.desc: If you want to start your career in programming but don’t know what to choose or where to begin, this course will set you on the right path until you land your first job.

tech.title: Technology
tech.subTitle: Technology Used
tech.desc: When you start learning a new skill, you might feel nervous or anxious. But don’t worry about it—you’ll master it easily with time and practice. Every small step brings you closer to your goal, and you’ll find yourself gradually gaining confidence and skill. Enjoy the process of learning and don’t hesitate to dive into the details.

traits.subTitle: Traits
traits.title: The personal traits that, if you possess, will help you excel in this field and as you learn this path.

info.title: What do I need to know before studying this path?
info.desc: We offer you a unique learning experience that allows you to start your journey from scratch with no worries. Our specialized team will guide you step by step, ensuring you understand the fundamental concepts and apply them effectively.
